title: Account Issue
body: I started playing league at my university campus, on my laptop (windows 10), and after I came back home I tried logging in to that account on my home computer (didn't have the laptop anymore, new computer and new location, never played at this location before) but when I logged in I was told to enter a new summoner name, so I'm assuming it reset my account, but from a different account (the one I'm posting from) I can see that the profile still exists.

replies.body: It sounds like you logged onto a different account, or possibly another region.  If you still have issues locating your account, try out our [account recovery steps ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account)to help.  Let me know if it does!
